Description.div:
Only applicable for published data of Delete Order event, which can be raised by the deleteOrder API. Action =
DELETE
will be published to indicate that the order line will be deleted.

Attribute.Name: AllocationDate
Attribute.Description: The date when this line will be allocated. This is calculated at order creation time, based on the node processing time. This field is not used from version 50 onwards. The ALLOCATION_LEAD_TIME field is used instead.

Attribute.Name: AllocationLeadTime
Attribute.Description: The number of days it will take any node to ship the item after a ship advice is sent. It is defaulted from the Rule Set Field Name (YFS_RULES.LEAD_TIME). The release process will this value, or the scheduled node's lead time (setup at ship node level), whichever is greater.

Attribute.Name: ApptWarning
Attribute.Description: Displays a warning message if CannotScheduleBeforeDate or CannotScheduleAfterDate fields have a Non-Null value.

Attribute.Name: AvailableQtyForStopDelivery
Attribute.Description: The quantity available through modification rules for making a stop delivery request for this line.

Attribute.Name: AwaitingDeliveryRequest
Attribute.Description: A flag to indicate if the order line is awaiting for a Delivery service association.

Description.div:
Indicates if this order has chained or related lines.
Default:
N
Valid Values:
Y
or
N

Attribute.Name: HasDeliveryLines
Attribute.Description: Indicates if the line has associated delivery lines. Valid only for product lines.

Description.div:
Indicates if order line has lines derived from it.
Default:
N
Valid Values:
Y
or
N

Attribute.Name: HasServiceLines
Attribute.Description: Indicates if the line has associated service lines. Valid only for product lines.

Attribute.Name: IntentionalBackorder
Attribute.Description: A flag to indicate if the order line should be backordered upon creation. If passed as 'Y', the line will be backordered even if inventory is available. This flag is ignored if reservation is mandatory.

Attribute.Name: InvoicedQty
Attribute.Description: Deprecated as Sterling Selling And Fulfillment Suite 9.2.1. Invoiced quantity on the order line.

Attribute.Name: InvoicedQuantity
Attribute.Description: Invoiced quantity on the order line.

Attribute.Name: IsBundleParent
Attribute.Description:
Indicates if Order line is bundle parent line or not.
Valid Values:
Y
or
N

Attribute.Name: MaxLineStatus
Attribute.Description: Maximum order line status among all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MaxLineStatusDesc
Attribute.Description: Description of maximum order line status among all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MinLineStatus
Attribute.Description: Minimum order line status among all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MinLineStatusDesc
Attribute.Description: Description of minimum order line status among all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MultipleStatusesExist
Attribute.Description: If order line is in more than one status then this flag will be returned as "Y".

Attribute.Name: OpenQty
Attribute.Description: Total quantity that can be cancelled from the line.

Attribute.Name: OverallStatus
Attribute.Description: A description of the order line's overall status determined by the YFSGetOverallStatusUE.

Attribute.Name: RemainingQty
Attribute.Description: Remaining quantity.

Attribute.Name: ReturnReasonLongDesc
Attribute.Description: Long description of the return reason code.

Attribute.Name: ReturnReasonShortDesc
Attribute.Description: Short description of the return reason code.

Attribute.Name: ReturnableQty
Attribute.Description: Quantity of item that could be returned from this line at its current status.

Attribute.Name: ScacAndService
Attribute.Description: Value of SCAC and Service code.

Attribute.Name: ScacAndServiceKey
Attribute.Description: Link to YFS_SCAC_AND_SERVICE table.

Attribute.Name: Status
Attribute.Description: Status description of the order line.

Attribute.Name: StatusQuantity
Attribute.Description: Quantity on the order line in the current status.

Attribute.Name: SubstituteItemID
Attribute.Description: Substituted ItemID. This field is only populated if the item on the Order line is substituted. This field is deprecated, see OverrideItemID on the OrderStatus/Details element.

Attribute.Name: SubstituteItemUOM
Attribute.Description: Substituted Item UOM. This field is only populated if the item on the Order line is substituted. This field is deprecated, see OverrideItemID on the OrderStatus/Details element.

Description.div:
Indicates if data is fetched from the history table rather than the regular table.
Default:
N
Valid Values:
Y
or
N

Only applicable for published data of Delete Order event, which can be raised by the deleteOrder API. Action =
DELETE
will be published to indicate that the order will be deleted.
The date that will be used for pricing the order.

Indicates if the billing, shipping, payment, tax, and currency information on the order should be defaulted from the customer information. When the flag is set to "Y", and a valid customer is found, the billing, shipping, and tax information on the order will be defaulted either from the customer or from the customer contact. The payment method on the order will only be defaulted if there is no payment method on the order. The currency will only be defaulted if the customer's IsDefaultCurrency is set to 'Y'.
Default:
N
Valid Values:
Y
or
N

Attribute.Name: DriverDate
Attribute.Description: Date used to driver order processing. '01' represents ReqShipDate, '02' represents ReqDeliveryDate.

Description.div: The channel through which this order was created. If the value of EntryType on the order matches the value of the common code Entry_Type, the common code's attributes are considered during order validation.

Indicates if this order has chained or related lines.
Default:
N
Valid Values:
Y
or
N

Indicates if the order has any delivery lines.
Default:
N
Valid Values:
Y
or
N

Attribute.Name: HasPendingChanges
Attribute.Description: If order has pending changes then this flag will be returned as "Y".

Description.div:
Indicates if the order has any product lines.
Default:
N
Valid Values:
Y
or
N

Indicates if the order has any service lines.
Default:
N
Valid Values:
Y
or
N

This flag determines whether an hold has been placed on the order when certain hold types criteria are met. If order is on hold, default configuration will stop the shceduling and release process for the order. The flag is reset to 'N' when all the hold types have been resolved on the order and all of its order lines. Based on hold type configuration, certain transactions may not be allowed to process. Note that there is no validation made on the hold applied but this flag can be reset by the application based on hold types existed on the order.
Default:
N
Valid Values:
Y
or
N

This flag indicates whether the expiration date is a system recommended date or whether it is already determined for the buyer. The value is Y if expiration date is system recommended. This flag only applies to Quotes.

Attribute.Name: MaxOrderStatus
Attribute.Description: Maximum order status based on all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MaxOrderStatusDesc
Attribute.Description: Description of maximum order status based on all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MinOrderStatus
Attribute.Description: Minimum order status based on all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MinOrderStatusDesc
Attribute.Description: Description of minimum order status based on all records that belong to an order.

Attribute.Name: MultipleStatusesExist
Attribute.Description: If order is in more than one status then this flag will be returned as "Y".

Attribute.Name: OverallStatus
Attribute.Description: A description of the order's overall status determined by the YFSGetOverallStatusUE.

Attribute.Name: PendingChangesUserID
Attribute.Description: This attribute indicates user, who performed pending changes on the order.

Attribute.Name: ProcessPaymentOnReturnOrder
Attribute.Description: Indicates that payment methods should be copied onto the return order and that refunds should be processed there, as opposed to the original sales order. This is only valid for return orders.

Description.div: The User Group of the user who created the order.

Attribute.Name: ScacAndService
Attribute.Description: Value of SCAC and Service code.

Attribute.Name: ScacAndServiceKey
Attribute.Description: Link to YFS_SCAC_AND_SERVICE table.

Attribute.Name: SourcingClassification
Attribute.Description: This attribute will be used to determine node for sourcing.

Attribute.Name: Status
Attribute.Description: Status description of the order.

Description.div:
Indicates if data should be retrieved from the history table rather than the regular table.
Default:
N
Valid Values:
Y
or
N

Attribute.Name: IsItemSuperseded
Attribute.Description:
This flag indicates if this item has been superseded.
Valid Values: Y , N

Attribute.Name: DisplayItemDescription
Attribute.Description: User defined description of the item.

Attribute.Name: IsValid
Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the item is valid.

Attribute.Name: UnitVolume
Attribute.Description: Calculated volume of one unit of item quantity.

Attribute.Name: UnitVolumeUOM
Attribute.Description: Unit of measure in which the item volume is measured.

Attribute.Name: ComponentDescription
Attribute.Description: Description of the Component Item

Attribute.Name: ComponentItemGroupCode
Attribute.Description: Item Group Code for the Component Item

Attribute.Name: ComponentItemID
Attribute.Description: Along with ComponentOrganizationCode and ComponentUnitOfMeasure, it identifies a component item.

Attribute.Name: ComponentItemKey
Attribute.Description: Component item's primary key

Attribute.Name: ComponentKitCode
Attribute.Description: Item Kit Code for the Component Item

Attribute.Name: ComponentOrganizationCode
Attribute.Description: Organization that maintains catalog

Attribute.Name: ComponentUnitOfMeasure
Attribute.Description: Unit of measure for the Component Item

Attribute.Name: IsItemSuperseded
Attribute.Description:
This flag indicates if this item has been superseded.
Valid Values: Y , N

Attribute.Name: DisplayItemDescription
Attribute.Description: User defined description of the item.

Attribute.Name: IsValid
Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the item is valid.

Attribute.Name: UnitVolume
Attribute.Description: Calculated volume of one unit of item quantity.

Attribute.Name: UnitVolumeUOM
Attribute.Description: Unit of measure in which the item volume is measured.

Description.div: Specifies the activity to be performed for the item.
Attribute to specify the Sequence Number in which the Instruction should be performed.
A list of child items of an item with variations.
Contains information about order line pricing and quantity details.

Attribute.Name: AdditionalLinePriceTotal
Attribute.Description: Total Price for all non-informational Additional Line Prices for the OrderLine. List Price times ActualPricingQuantity.

Attribute.Name: BundleTotal
Attribute.Description: Sum of line totals of all the bundle components. Components having price for information purposes are ignored from this calculation.

Element.Description: Deprecated as Sterling Selling And Fulfillment Suite 9.0 . See ComputedPrice element for more details. The overall total of a bundle parent when including its components. Components with IsLinePriceForInformationOnly flag set to Y are ignored in the total calculation. If the bundle parent is a recommended line, then the total will be based on the BundlePricingStrategy defined for the item.

Description.div: Total Charges for the bundle across all its components.
Total Discounts for the bundle across all its components.

Element.Description: Contains computed information about the price and total amount details for the order line. If the line is a bundle parent, components with IsLinePriceForInformationOnly flag set to Y are ignored in the total calculation. If the bundle parent is a recommended line, then the total will be based on the BundlePricingStrategy defined for the item.

Attribute.Name: AdditionalLinePriceTotal
Attribute.Description: Total Price for all non-informational Additional Line Prices for the Component Lines of a Bundle Parent. List Price times ActualPricingQuantity.

Description.div: The computed amount of the charges for this line.
The computed total of the discount amounts.

Attribute.Name: ExtendedPrice
Attribute.Description: The computed price for this line before taxes, charges, and discounts are accounted for.

Attribute.Name: LineCost
Attribute.Description: The total cost incurred on this order line. If this order line is part of a bundle, LineCost is evaluated based on the bundle's' pricing strategy.

Attribute.Name: LineTotal
Attribute.Description: The total amount for this line.

Attribute.Name: LineTotalWithoutTax
Attribute.Description: The computed total amount for this line before taxes are accounted for.

Attribute.Name: PercentProfitMargin
Attribute.Description: The percentage of the profit margin for this line. Depending on the pricing strategy, all components or part of the components are considered for the profit margin calculation. OrderLine Option OptionPrices and OrderLine AdditionalLinePriceTotals are not considered for the Profit Margin.

Attribute.Name: Tax
Attribute.Description: The computed amount of taxes for this line.

Attribute.Name: UnitPrice
Attribute.Description: The price for one unit of this line.

Attribute.Name: TargetItemDesc
Attribute.Description: The Long description of the item.

Attribute.Name: TargetItemShortDesc
Attribute.Description: The short description of the item.

Attribute.Description: The short description of the item.

Description.div: This flag indicates whether UnitPrice passed must be used and price determination ignored, if price determination is configured and enabled. Valid values are 'Y' or 'N'. If this attribute's value is not passed in the input, by default its value is copied from attribute IsPriceLocked of LinePriceInfo from its respective OrderLine.

Quantity used for using this option.
For Special Service Quantity is calculated by below formula:
Option Quantity = (OrderedQty of its OrderLine) * (Number of associated Special Services per ordered PROD item )

Attribute.Name: NumberOfWorkOrders
Attribute.Description: Number of work orders generated for this order line.

Description.div:
The ConsiderCurrentSlot flag indicates that system should consider the available capacity of the current slots, which the current timestamp falls under.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N
The quantity requested in the work order's volume unit of measure, which is specified in the VolumeUOM field of the work order
The quantity requested in the work order's weight unit of measure, which is specified in the WeightUOM field of the work order
Flag indicates if this record has been changed by this transaction
Description of item.
Short Description of item.

Attribute.Name: NumberOfInstructions
Attribute.Description: Number of instructions.

Attribute.Description: Name of the attribute.

Attribute.Name: Value
Attribute.Description: Value of the attribute.

Attribute.Name: NumberOfKitLines
Attribute.Description: Total number of kit lines fetched.

Attribute.Name: ComponentQty
Attribute.Description: Component quantity.

Description.div: Contains information about the quantities for a kit line in Transactional Unit Of Measure.

Attribute.Description: The number of components required to one kit.

Attribute.Name: NumberOfAdditionalAddresses
Attribute.Description: Number of additional addresses applicable to this order line.

Description.div: Describes the Sourcing Controls attached to a OrderLine .

Attribute.Name: NumberOfNotes

Description.div: The quantity reserved.

Description.div: Contains information about the child relationships of the order lines.

Contains information about the child order line for the relationship.

Contains information about the child order line for the relationship.

Attribute.Description: Description of hold type status.

Attribute.Name: TransactionName
Attribute.Description: Transaction name which created the hold type.

Attribute.Name: StatusDescription
Attribute.Description: Description of hold type status.

Attribute.Name: TransactionName
Attribute.Description: Transaction name which created the hold type.

Description.div: Contains information about the service request details for the order line.
Contains information about the service request details for the order line.
Contains information about the request details for which this delivery or service request is created.

Attribute.Name: Quantity
Attribute.Description: Quantity.

Attribute.Name: TransactionalUOM

Description.div: Contains information about the price and total amount details for the order line. Some attributes including UnitPrice, ExtendedPrice, OptionPrice, PricingQty, Discount, Charges, Tax, and LineTotal are not template controlled.

Attribute.Name: AdditionalLinePriceTotal
Attribute.Description: Total Price for all non-informational Additional Line Prices for the OrderLine. List Price times ActualPricingQuantity.

Attribute.Name: Charges
Attribute.Description: The amount of the charges for this line.

Attribute.Name: Discount
Attribute.Description: The total of the discount amounts.

Attribute.Name: ExtendedPrice
Attribute.Description: The price for this line before taxes, charges, and discounts are accounted for.

Attribute.Name: LineCost
Attribute.Description: The total cost incured in this order line.

Attribute.Name: LineTotal
Attribute.Description: The total amount for this line.

Attribute.Name: LineTotalWithoutTax
Attribute.Description: The total amount for this line before taxes are accounted for.

Description.div: The percentage of the total for which manual discounts were applied. Sum of Manual LineCharges / (LineTotal - Sum of Manual LineCharges)

The percentage discount that a customer has received on a line based on the List Price. This percentage does not consider taxes, shipping charges, etc. Only Charges considered for profit margin are considered in the calculation. While ManualDiscountPercentage only considers manual discounts, this calculation also factors in manual price overrides. 100 - 100 *(ExtendedPrice + Sum of LineCharges Considered For Profit) / (ListPrice * PricingQty + Sum of Non-Manual LineCharges Considered For Profit)

Attribute.Name: OptionPrice
Attribute.Description: The total option price for this line.

Description.div:
The percentage of the amount being made on the product being sold.
((UnitCost of the Item multiplied by ActualPricingQty) subtracted from (ExtendedPrice added to the LineCharges that are considered for profit margin calculation)) divided by (ExtendedPrice added to the LineCharges that are considered for profit margin calculation)
If ExtendedPrice+LineCharges is zero, PercentProfitMargin is not returned. OrderLine Option OptionPrices and OrderLine AdditionalLinePriceTotals are not considered for the Profit Margin.

Attribute.Name: PricingQty
Attribute.Description: The quantity used to calculate the extended price.

Attribute.Name: ShippingBaseCharge
Attribute.Description: The amount that will be charged for shipping without discounts or charges.

Attribute.Name: ShippingCharges
Attribute.Description: The total of charges associated with shipping.

Attribute.Name: ShippingDiscount
Attribute.Description: The total of discounts associated with shipping.

Attribute.Name: ShippingTotal
Attribute.Description: The total amount for shipping the line including shipping discounts and charges.

Attribute.Name: Tax
Attribute.Description: The amount of taxes for this line.

Attribute.Name: UnitPrice
Attribute.Description: The price for one unit of this line.

Attribute.Name: AmountFromAddnlLinePrices
Attribute.Description: The Amount of the ChargeAmount that was derived from AdditionalLinePrice sources.

Attribute.Name: ChargeAmount
Attribute.Description: Charge amount.

Attribute.Name: ChargeNameKey
Attribute.Description: Link to YFS_CHARGE_NAME table.

Attribute.Name: InvoicedChargeAmount
Attribute.Description: Invoiced charge amount.

Attribute.Name: InvoicedChargePerUnit
Attribute.Description: Invoiced charge per unit.

Attribute.Name: IsBillable
Attribute.Description: Describes if the charge is billable. Default: N

Attribute.Name: IsDiscount
Attribute.Description: Describes if the charge is discountable. Default: N

Attribute.Name: IsManual
Attribute.Description: Determines whether the charge was manually created or created automatically through pricing engine. Valid Values: Y , N , or M Default: Y .

Attribute.Name: IsRefundable
Attribute.Description: Describes if the charge is refundable. Default: Y

Attribute.Name: IsShippingCharge
Attribute.Description: Determines whether the charge is a shipping charge. This attribute value is system defined and cannot be overridden. The value for this attribute is set as Y only for Charge Name configured as CHARGE_NAME_FOR_SHIPPING in financial rule. For all other Charges this attribute is set to N .

Attribute.Name: RemainingChargeAmount
Attribute.Description: Remaining charge amount.

Attribute.Name: RemainingChargePerLine
Attribute.Description: Remaining charge per line.

Attribute.Name: RemainingChargePerUnit
Attribute.Description: Remaining charge per unit.

Description.div: Contains tax related information for various entities in the system. If ChargeCategory and ChargeName are not provided, tax will be considered as a billable and positive charge. If not implementing YFSRecalculateLineTaxUE , ChargeCategory , Tax , and TaxPercentage are required for the default repricing logic.

Attribute.Name: ChargeCategory
Attribute.Description:
The charge category for which tax is being charged. For example, Labeling or Handling. To specify the tax for the line price, use the charge category
Price
.

Attribute.Name: ChargeNameKey
Attribute.Description: Link to YFS_CHARGE_NAME table.

Attribute.Name: Reference1
Attribute.Description: Reference 1

Attribute.Name: Reference2
Attribute.Description: Reference 2

Attribute.Name: Reference3
Attribute.Description: Reference 3

Attribute.Name: RemainingTax
Attribute.Description: Remaining tax.

Description.div: The tax amount. Tax cannot be less than zero. During the default repricing logic, this is recalculated using the TaxPercentage and the price of the related ChargeCategory . This can be overridden with the YFSRecalulateLineTaxUE.

Attribute.Name: InvoicedTax
Attribute.Description: The amount of this tax which had been invoiced.

Attribute.Name: OverallTax
Attribute.Description: The total amount of this tax.

Attribute.Name: RemainingTax
Attribute.Description: The amount of this tax that has not been invoiced.

Attribute.Name: TaxName
Attribute.Description: Tax name.

Description.div:
This table stores status-quantity break up for each line-schedule.
If the order line has moved to Backordered From Node and rescheduled, the order line statuses from both the scheduled line and the previously backordered line will be diaplayed.

Attribute.Name: ReceivingNode
Attribute.Description: The node to which the order line is to be shipped.

Attribute.Name: ShipNode
Attribute.Description: The node at which the order line will be fulfilled.

Attribute.Name: StatusDescription
Attribute.Description: Description of the order line status.

Description.div: Contains information about the quantities for kit detail in Transactional Unit Of Measure.

Attribute.Name: Quantity
Attribute.Description: Quantity.

Attribute.Name: TransactionalUOM
Attribute.Description: UOM on which all the transactional quantities are specified.

Attribute.Name: StatusQty
Attribute.Description: Quantity currently in this status.

Attribute.Name: TotalQuantity
Attribute.Description: Total quantity which has ever been moved into this status. If there is a cyclic status (for example, backorder which can happen multiple times), this attribute does not provide useful information.

Attribute.Name: TransactionalUOM
Attribute.Description: UOM on which all the transactional quantities are specified.

Attribute.Name: FillQuantity
Attribute.Description: The minimum order line quantity that must be fulfilled in an order release before it is shipped.

Attribute.Name: InvoicedQuantity
Attribute.Description: Invoiced quantity on the order line.

Attribute.Name: OpenQty
Attribute.Description: Total quantity that can be cancelled from the line.

Attribute.Name: OrderedQty
Attribute.Description: The quantity of the the line item that has been ordered. If part of line is cancelled, this number is reduced appropriately. If an order line is returned, this number is not reduced.

Attribute.Name: OriginalOrderedQty
Attribute.Description: Quantity which was ordered during order creation. This is not modified after order confirmation.

Attribute.Name: ReceivedQty
Attribute.Description: Received quantity on the order line.

Attribute.Name: RemainingQty
Attribute.Description: Remaining quantity.

Attribute.Name: SettledQuantity
Attribute.Description: Quantity which should be settled before it is actually invoiced.

Attribute.Name: ShippedQuantity
Attribute.Description: Shippped quantity on the order line.

Attribute.Name: SplitQty
Attribute.Description: Quantity which has been split from this line due to substitutions, price negotiations etc.

Attribute.Name: StatusQuantity
Attribute.Description: Quantity on the order line in the current status.

Attribute.Name: TranDiscrepancyQty
Attribute.Description: Quantity which was over or under received.

Attribute.Name: TransactionalUOM
Attribute.Description: UOM on which all the transactional quantities are specified.

Attribute.Name: AllocatedCapacity
Attribute.Description: Allocation capacity

Attribute.Name: CapacityReference
Attribute.Description: Capacity reference

Attribute.Name: PromisedApptEndDate
Attribute.Description: Promised appointment end date

Attribute.Name: PromisedApptStartDate
Attribute.Description: Promised appointment start date

Attribute.Name: ResourcePoolKey
Attribute.Description: Link to YFS_RES_POOL table.

Description.div: The total number of order approval detail records.

Attribute.Name: TotalNumberOfRecords
Attribute.Description: Total number of Approvers for the Violation.

Attribute.Name: TotalNumberOfRecords
Attribute.Description: Total number of Approval Statuses for an Approver.

Attribute.Name: TotalNumberOfRecords
Attribute.Description: Total number of References for a Violation

Description.div: The element containing the unique fields for a given Concrete Transaction Info table.

Attribute.Name: TotalNumberOfRecords
Attribute.Description: Total number of Violations that do/did not require Approval.

Attribute.Name: TotalNumberOfRecords
Attribute.Description: Total number of References for a Violation

Description.div: The element containing the unique fields for a given Concrete Transaction Info table.

Attribute.Name: ExtendedPrice
Attribute.Description: ExtendedPrice of the AdditionalLinePrice for this OrderLine. Equal to the Price of the additional line times ActualPricingQuantity.

Attribute.Name: IsPromotionOnOrder
Attribute.Description: Determines whether the Award was created for a Promotion on the order.

Attribute.Name: IsPromotionOnOrderLine
Attribute.Description: Determines whether the Award was created for a Promotion on the order line.
